name: Earth 2140: Mission Pack: Final Conflict
overview: This dual-format expansion for the Amiga and Mac versions of Earth 2140 contains Mission Pack: Final Conflict, thereby offering 110 new missions (80 single player ones and 30 multiplayer maps), 6 new units, 2 new buildings and one new terrain. Additionally, this expansion adds the LAN multiplayer mode that was missing from the original release of Earth: 2140 for the Amiga.
